snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Thursday, selections include Foursquare’s plans to expand its ad sales and search, robots that live in the sewers and one of the first...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Thursday, selections include Foursquare’s plans to expand its ad sales and search, robots that live in the sewers and one of the first agents for software developers.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Talent Agency for Coders, and Sewer Bots
